paper.title: On the use of the Virtual Observatory to select calibrators for phase-referenced astrometry of exoplanet-host stars
paper.authors: Beust, H.; Bonneau, D.; Mourard, D.; Lafrasse, S.; Mella, G.; Duvert, G.; Chelli, A.
paper.journal: Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society, Volume 414, Issue 1, pp. 108-115.

paper.title: Chemical Clues on the Formation of Planetary Systems: C/O Versus Mg/Si for HARPS GTO Sample
